title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 16 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year
Number of employees is gradually constant from 2003 to 2018.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2006 and 2007.
Max Number of employees about 105175.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Number of employees about 75740.0 was recorded at Year 2003
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 16 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2003 to 2007.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
